TopicTitle: Cold Station One + Heru'Ur Super-heavy launcher

Articles.Content:
Cold Station One is a craft that I created to go further than I\'ve ever travelled before.

There are no other planets, so it\'s a nice though to think my station is still up there, waiting for me to come back.

The cold station orbit\'s at 3 KU.

Kerbological units = the distance from Kol to the Kerbin, 3 KU = 13.5 Million KM * 3 = 40.5 million Km, cold stations orbit.

Images:

Stilts.

On the launch Pad

Cold Station One En Route

Orbit

A dim, distant sun.

Even Bigger orbit.

Fading...

---Heru\'Ur---

Variable Size Cargo Bay

On the Pad

TMI Stage

Video:

Holy...

That first stage, despite its distinct lack of BOOSTARS, could still make Jeb drool.
I could totally add boosters to her... But I don\'t see why I would. She can already ready reach any orbit around Kol(kerbol, sun whatever.) so range isn\'t an issue.
Looks like a return trip isn\'t possible...

TOP- You used my favorite part THE KubLab

Hint: The KubLab is unfortunably a decoupler. If you want to change that, go to the part.config open with editor, delete all and copy this:

// Kerbal Space Program - Part Config

// KubLab Space Laboratory

//

// --- general parameters ---

name = KubLab

module = Strut

author = Oana Croitoru Reedited by: K.C.S.T.

// --- asset parameters ---

mesh = kublab.dae

scale = 1.0

texture = kublab.png

specPower = 0.5

rimFalloff = 3

alphaCutoff = 0.5

// --- node definitions ---

// definition format is Position X, Position Y, Position Z, Up X, Up Y, Up Z

node_stack_top = 0.0, 2.324, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0

node_stack_bottom = 0.0, -2.524, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0

// --- FX definitions ---

//fx_gasBurst_white = 0.0, 2.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, activate

sound_vent_large = activate

// --- editor parameters ---

cost = 40000

category = 3

subcategory = 0

title = KubLab

manufacturer = KubLab Industries XD

description = KubLab Module

// attachment rules: stack, srfAttach, allowStack, allowSrfAttach, allowCollision

attachRules = 1,0,1,0,0

// --- standard part parameters ---

mass = 2

dragModelType = default

maximum_drag = 0.2

minimum_drag = 0.2

angularDrag = 2

crashTolerance = 7

maxTemp = 3600

Return trip is totally possible, it\'d just take a long ass time!

And I know what I\'m doing KCSP Thanks anyway!
Updated with show off of the launcher.

Return trip is totally possible, it\'d just take a long ass time!

And I know what I\'m doing KCSP Thanks anyway!

no problem

I just did the math, Cold station one weights in at 15.2 Tonnes. I\'m assuming the mass is measured in tonnes.

The Heru\'Ur without payload weights in at 546.16 Tonnes.

ok...two things...

one, please for the love of all things Kerbal post the craft file.

two, if you dont want to, please post the link to all the parts collections you used.

Much appreciated.

BONUS THIRD THING! that looks amazing.

Alrighty! I\'ll compile a list of all my mods in the morning!

I uploaded a video of the launcher
